title: The Run Up Episode 3 — Get hyped for the first ever women’s edition of Paris-Roubaix!
content:
Support us! BikeRumor may earn a small commission from affiliate links in this article. Learn more.

The Hell of the North. If you’ve been around cycling long enough, those words instantly bring to mind images of unrelenting cobble stones. Dust. Mud. And one of the best single day races on the men’s pro cycling calendar. And now, finally, we can add Paris-Roubaix to the women’s pro cycling calendar as well.

Originally scheduled for a debut in 2020, the first-ever women’s edition of Paris-Roubaix is now scheduled for tomorrow, 10/02. The men’s race will follow on 10/03. For those wanting to follow Paris-Roubaix Femmes, note that there is a completely separate website for the women’s race, including a list of broadcasters so you can watch the race, linked below.

paris-roubaix-femmes.fr
author: Zach Overholt
